title: Amazon’s Demand Cools as Investors Spot Weakness
itunes:title: Amazon’s Demand Cools as Investors Spot Weakness
description:
Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Matt Day discusses Amazon acknowledging that a hiring and warehouse-building binge during the pandemic is catching up with the company as e-commerce sales growth inevitably slows. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, shares his thoughts on Moderna seeking FDA approval of Covid vaccine for children under the age of 5. Bloomberg Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green talks about his Businessweek Magazine story DeSantis Battles Disney to Help Him Outshine Trump. Ric Edelman, Founder of Digital Assets Council of Financial Professionals, explains why blockchain technology and digital assets are leading to a fundamental shift in investing. And we Drive to the Close with Katie Nixon, CIO at Northern Trust.Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
